# Hi, I am Pedro César Del Campo Neira

Data Worker who transforms complex data into clear, actionable insights through visualization, modeling, and evidence-based storytelling. I am passionate about using data to understand people, systems, and real-world challenges. My goal is to make insights accessible, meaningful, and useful for better decision-making.

Statistician and Data Scientist with more than 12 years of extensive experience managing multidisciplinary and strategic analytical projects. Expert in processing and analyzing large volumes of data to generate key insights for decision-making. Proven track record in diverse fields including mobility, culture, health, fintech, marketing, education, nutrition, environment, social development, Indigenous communities, financial technology, and public policy. Known for my capacity for self-learning, adaptability to new technologies, and strong results-oriented mindset. Proficient in statistical sampling, multivariate methods, and predictive modeling, with advanced command of Python, R, SQL, and cloud-based analytical environments.

## What I do

::: {.grid .gap-3 .mt-3}
::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .g-col-lg-3}
**Statistical Design & Sampling**  
Methodological designs, sampling frames, and survey/redesign work for public policy, culture, environment, mobility, and multigeography rollouts.
:::
::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .g-col-lg-3}
**Predictive & Risk Modeling**  
Crash risk, health, and forecasting models using Python/R (multivariate methods, imputation, simulations, ML) with explainability and monitoring.
:::
::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .g-col-lg-3}
**Analytics & Data Products**  
Dashboards, KPIs, and data products in Power BI/Quarto; indicators, metadata, and delivery playbooks to operationalize decisions in government and industry.
:::
::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .g-col-lg-3}
**Training & Facilitation**  
Workshops and courses in R/Python, risk analysis, and data literacy for teams, universities, public agencies, and private companies.
:::
:::
